channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- Vesta Control Panel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- Vesta Control Panel

item.title: CVE-2022-3967|2024-08-03T01:27:54.186Z -- unspecified -- vesta%20control%20panel
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in Vesta Control Panel. Affected is an unknown function of the file func/main.sh of the component sed Handler. The manipulation leads to argument injection. An attack has to be approached locally. The name of the patch is 39561c32c12cabe563de48cc96eccb9e2c655e25. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. VDB-213546 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.
